title: Can't Download Update 6.20
body:
So I have been having trouble getting the update and it really sucks p-p.

This is what happened last time I tried to update it

calculating differences | 188 Files Scanned
Starts at 33%
Update Failed: Unspecified Error. Please check logs for more information (At 33%)

I have a wired connection and my connection is very good so I don't think it's my connection

What I have tried to fix it:
- Uninstalling and Reinstalling LoL
- Repair button
- Manual repair
- Restart Computer
- Restart Patcher
- Click the Retry Button (On the Unspecified Error pop-up)
- Letting it run (Gets to 99% with 0 Files Scanned on step 2/2 (I have let it run for 2 days in a row with no progress whatsoever))
- Running as an admin

I have gotten Unspecified Errors at 33%, 34%, 43%, 70%, 72% and 99%

I don't know if it's because I have it on a separate hard drive (With like 3 terabytes on it) and not on my Local Disc but when I had it on my local disc I didn't have enough space :P

I have tried everything that I can and I don't know what to do. I just want to play my League! :(

I tried again with someone saying they renamed their lol_game_client folder to lol_game_client. I got to 70% with 1 file scanned and got an Unspecified Error pop-up

Later, I  noticed that Windows had an update so I updated it. After that I uninstalled and reinstalled LoL. Got to 72% and got an Unspecified Error p-p. Nothing seems to be working.

Please help p-p

I'm dying inside p-p...

replies.body:
Failures after 32% during the patching process are usually caused by your patcher disconnecting from the patching servers. Since this happens due to conflicting network settings most of the time, I recommend working through [this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are good.

Let me know if this resolves your issue.
